original_text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done, because they repented not:
korean_text: 예수께서 권능을 가장 많이 행하신 고을들이 회개하지 아니하므로 그 때에 책망하시되

sentences.original_text: Then began he to upbraid the cities
wherein most of his mighty works were done
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그의 가장 큰 기적들이 행해졌기 때문이라
